003
004import com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.QueryPredicateDsl;
005import com.commercetools.api.predicates.query.order.OrderQueryBuilderDsl;
006
007public interface ByProjectKeyOrdersGetMixin extends
008        PagedQueryResourceRequest<ByProjectKeyOrdersGet, com.commercetools.api.models.order.OrderPagedQueryResponse, OrderQueryBuilderDsl> {
009
010    default ByProjectKeyOrdersGet byCustomerId(final String customerId) {
011        return withWhere("customerId = :customerId", "customerId", customerId);
012    }
013
014    default ByProjectKeyOrdersGet byCustomerEmail(final String customerEmail) {
015        return withWhere("customerEmail = :customerEmail", "customerEmail", customerEmail);
016    }
017
018    @Override
019    default OrderQueryBuilderDsl queryDsl() {
020        return QueryPredicateDsl.order();
021    }
022}
